casebody.data:
Frederick Esper, Respondent v. The New York Elevated Railroad Company, et al:, Appellants. Decided January 11, 1892. Appeal from a judgment rendered at the special term. Davies & Rapallo, attorneys, and Joseph E. Lord of counsel, for appellants. Peckham & Tyler, attorneys, and Henry G. Atwater of counsel, for respondent.

Before Freedman, P. J., McAdam and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Opinion by Gildersleeve, J.; Freedman, P. J., and McAdam, J., concurred.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
